project.title: Ashantis Jones
project.description: Ashantis Jones is an event planner from Cleaveland, Ohio that entertains and creates memorable events through detail oriented design and calculated execution. Adam designed Ashantis's portfolio to assist in her job hunt as a graduate of the BFA Theatre Management at DePaul University looking for opportunities in the event management space.
project.description_short: Ashantis Jones is an event planner from Cleaveland, Ohio that entertains and creates memorable events through detail oriented design and calculated execution.
